projects.title: Jay's Smoothies(Cookie Stand)
projects.description: One of the most coolest project I had opportunity to work on. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Website handles all sales purchases and allows to store all products of smooties from Jay's Smoothies.

projects.title: Fishing Hotspots
projects.description: Group project for final project. I was responsible for gathering information on the best lakes in middle Tennessee to catch popular kinds of fish. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: Odd Duck Products
projects.description: Great project. Learning how to pull up images through Javascript and how to set up vote counts for each picture was amazing. I've learned a lot!
